channel.title: Packing 474 animations instead of 602
channel.description:
I don't usually do this stuff, So i really need help from you guys. So i have this ( PI 317-377? i don't really know lol ) loading 602 animations and NPC's, Which is horribly ugly. What i wanted to do is change those animations to 474 instead aswell as NPC's , I got the whole 474 Data package ( npcs anims maps etc.. ), For now i just want to change animations and npcs. So what i did was use galkons method, Which was already in the server i downloaded. And i put the 474 animations in [i]cache/index1/[/i] So i added repackCacheIndex(1); at the startup method to load the new animations. But i get the error: [code]Started repacking index 1. Error packing cache index 1. Finished repacking 1.[/code] What could have i done wrong? Help is very appreciated :)
Nevermind, I had placed the [i]repackCacheIndex(1);[/i] in the wrong place inside the code.

item.title: Packing 474 animations instead of 602
item.dc:creator: @naseem142 naseem142
item.description:
@naseem142 wrote:

I don't usually do this stuff, So i really need help from you guys.

So i have this ( PI 317-377? i don’t really know lol ) loading 602 animations and NPC’s, Which is horribly ugly. What i wanted to do is change those animations to 474 instead aswell as NPC’s , I got the whole 474 Data package ( npcs anims maps etc… ), For now i just want to change animations and npcs.

So what i did was use galkons method, Which was already in the server i downloaded. And i put the 474 animations in cache/index1/
So i added repackCacheIndex(1); at the startup method to load the new animations. But i get the error:

Started repacking index 1. Error packing cache index 1. Finished repacking 1.

What could have i done wrong? Help is very appreciated

Nevermind, I had placed the repackCacheIndex(1); in the wrong place inside the code.
